image_prompts.title: Avian Alien (Continental World, cyberpunk)
image_prompts.description: A Avian alien from a Continental world, depicted in a cyberpunk style. Physical characteristics: Bird-like creatures with beaks, feathers, and wing structures. Variation: peacock variants. Features: some have crests, colorful plumage. Visual details: jewelry with feather motifs, lightweight aerodynamic garments. The alien with vibrant, healthy appearance and with unusual, unsettling features, set in a crystalline cavern, holding a bioluminescent orb. AI prompt elements: Avian alien, bird-like features, feathers, beak, wing structures, colorful plumage, aerial grace, predatory or songbird appearance, vibrant feather patterns, aerodynamic clothing.

image_prompts.title: Plantoid Alien (Alpine World, biomechanical)
image_prompts.description: A Plantoid alien from a Alpine world, depicted in a biomechanical style. Physical characteristics: Plant-based lifeforms with photosynthetic capabilities. Variation: flower-inspired. Features: root systems, some have Groot-inspired wooden appearances. Visual details: vibrant petals with glowing veins, bark armor with natural engravings. The alien with robust, athletic physique and with a transient appearance, set in a floating sky islands, holding a intricate blade. AI prompt elements: Plantoid alien, plant-like features, leaves and flowers, bark-textured skin, photosynthetic, green/brown colors, nature harmony aesthetic, glowing petals, vine accessories.

image_prompts.title: Aquatic Alien (Desert World, biomechanical)
image_prompts.description: A Aquatic alien from a Desert world, depicted in a biomechanical style. Physical characteristics: Water-adapted species with marine features. Variation: amphibian. image_prompts.title: Fungoid Alien (Steppe World, realistic)
image_prompts.description: A Fungoid alien from a Steppe world, depicted in a realistic style. Physical characteristics: Mushroom and fungal-inspired forms with spore-based reproduction. Variation: parasitic forms. Features: some appear parasitic controlling host bodies, distinctive caps, gills, organic growth patterns. Visual details: earthy textures with coral-like accents, organic armor with fungal growths. The alien with wise, calculating eyes and with unusual, unsettling features, set in a orbital space station, holding a tribal mask. AI prompt elements: Fungoid alien, mushroom-like, spore-based, organic growth patterns, caps and gills, earthy colors, parasitic or symbiotic appearance, bioluminescent spores, fungal armor.

image_prompts.title: Necroid Alien (Ocean World, fantasy)

image_prompts.title: Arthropoid Alien (Tundra World, baroque)
